## hange commit

Makes a commit to current git branch

### Synopsis

Takes a changelist of git, generates a commit message and commits to a current branch.

```
hange commit [input] [flags]
```

### Examples

```
hange commit "Task description"
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for commit
```

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.hange.yaml)
  -v, --verbose         verbose logging
```
